snippet: Working with luminaries like Merv Griffin on television, Barbra Streisand in Central Park and Judy Garland at Carnegie Hall, Mr. Lindsey had a musical career spanning six decades.
abstract: Mort Lindsey, pianist and versatile bandleader, dies at age 89.
lead_paragraph: Working with luminaries like Merv Griffin on television, Barbra Streisand in Central Park and Judy Garland at Carnegie Hall, Mr. Lindsey had a musical career spanning six decades.

headline.seo: Mort Lindsey, Musical Director, Dies at 89
headline.main: Mort Lindsey, TV Bandleader and Accompanist to Stars, Dies at 89
headline.print_headline: Mort Lindsey, 89, Pianist And Versatile Bandleader
